title: Noble Intentions: Episode 3
description: In Noble Intentions: Episode 3, Jack Noble finds himself on the southern coast of France near the Monaco border. The French need him to take care of some dirty laundry. So dirty that their own operatives can't touch it.Jack also plans a meeting with his long time nemesis, Charles. The Old Man put out a contract on his former associate, a contract that Jack was happy to accept. He'd even do it for free since Charles is the one responsible for Clarissa's coma.However, Jack needs to watch his back. Southern France might prove to be too unfriendly.
author: L.T. Ryan
